title: Inversion 1
description: Change the normal sentence into one with inversion. For example: "We had hardly arrived when Julie burst into the house" becomes "Hardly had we arrived when Julie burst into the house".

parts.value: John had never been to such a fantastic restaurant.

parts.answer: Never had John been to such a fantastic restaurant.
answerList: Never had John been to such a fantastic restaurant.

parts.value: I in no way want to be associated with this project.

parts.answer: In no way do I want to be associated with this project.
answerList: In no way do I want to be associated with this project.

parts.value: They had no sooner eaten dinner than the ceiling crashed onto the dining table.
